buttons.longDescription: Beautifully designed button that makes it rain confetti!

examples.descriptionOfUsage: lendingstack is using the confetti effect after someone made a purchase!

faq.question: Can it make fireworks, too?
faq.answer: No, it is a CONFETTI button...

buttons.metaDescription: Beautifully designed button that makes it rain confetti!

buttons.shortDescription: Its shimmering golden hue exudes a sense of grandeur and prestige, making it a standout element on any platform.
buttons.longDescription: The Golden Shimmer Tilted Button is a testament to opulence and sophistication, designed to elevate any digital interface with its radiant allure. This component embodies the essence of luxury, crafted with meticulous attention to detail and a passion for exquisite design.
